cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.16) project(customeffect LANGUAGES CXX)
set(CMAKE_AUTOMOC ON)
if(NOT DEFINED INSTALL_EXAMPLESDIR) set(INSTALL_EXAMPLESDIR "examples") endif()
set(INSTALL_EXAMPLEDIR "${INSTALL_EXAMPLESDIR}/quick3d/customeffect")
find_package(Qt6 REQUIRED COMPONENTS Core Gui Quick Quick3D)
qt_add_executable(customeffect main.cpp )
set_target_properties(customeffect PROPERTIES WIN32_EXECUTABLE TRUE MACOSX_BUNDLE TRUE )
target_link_libraries(customeffect PUBLIC Qt::Core Qt::Gui Qt::Quick Qt::Quick3D )
qt_add_qml_module(customeffect URI Example VERSION 1.0 QML_FILES main.qml RESOURCES checkers2.png effect.frag effect2.frag effect2.vert qt_logo_rect.png NO_RESOURCE_TARGET_PATH )
install(TARGETS customeffect RUNTIME DESTINATION "${INSTALL_EXAMPLEDIR}" BUNDLE DESTINATION "${INSTALL_EXAMPLEDIR}" LIBRARY DESTINATION "${INSTALL_EXAMPLEDIR}" )
